text: Cradle of Filth is an extreme metal band from England. Some people say the bandâ€™s musical style is black metal, others say that it is gothic metal, extreme metal, or many other different styles. Cradle of Filth had many different members. It was founded by Dani Filth in 1991. He is still the leader of the band. Cradle of Filth is very well known and has enjoyed success on TV and the radio. == Albums == * The Principle of Evil Made Flesh - (1994) * Dusk and Her Embrace - (1997) * Cruelty and the Beast - (1998) * Midian - (2000) * Damnation and a Day - (2003) * Nymphetamine - (2004) * Thornography - (2006) * Godspeed on the Devil's Thunder (2008) * Darkly, Darkly, Venus Aversa (2010) * The Manticore and Other Horrors (2012) * Hammer of the Witches (2015) * Cryptoriana - The Seductiveness of Decay (2017) * Existence Is Futile (2021) == Members == * Dani Filth - Vocals * Paul Allender - Guitar * Charles Hedger - Guitar * Dave Pybus - Bass * Martin Skaroupka - Drums * Sarah Jezebel Deva - Backing Vocals * Rosie Smith - Live Keyboards ==References== Category:English heavy metal bands
title: Cradle of Filth
